# GitHub Configuration

> GitHub-specific configuration and workflows

## Overview

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files, including issue templates, workflow definitions, and repository settings.

## Contents

| File/Directory | Purpose |
|---------------|---------|
| `workflows/` | GitHub Actions workflows |
| `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` | Issue templates |
| `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` | PR template |
| `dependabot.yml` | Dependency update configuration |

## Workflows

- **CI** - Continuous integration
- **Docs** - Documentation generation
- **Release** - Release automation

## Issue Templates

- Bug reports
- Feature requests
- Documentation issues
- Research proposals

## Contributing

See [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for how to use these templates.
